content: @nikomatsakis Why do the Chalk interface need to use Lift? Is this a 'gcx/'tcx leftover thing? I was thinking it would be a good idea to make Lift use the interners instead of in_arena so we don't need to add efficient arenas with in_arena. I think Lift is pretty much only used for Debug and Display impls in the compiler now.Lift in Chalk interface
@Zoxc I'll have to review; those interfaces are indeed somewhat dated and I've been wanting to rip out the chalk integration and redo it in a new way.
I guess it doesn't matter if these get a bit faster or slower?
@Zoxc no that doesn't matter, I hope to remove them soon in any case
